mapper.select: select a.prjno, b.memno, b.name, b.job, a.auth from members a, membership b where a.memno = b.memno and a.prjno=#{prjno}

SELECT a.memno, c.name, a.done, b.allwork FROM (SELECT b.memno, count(*) done FROM tasks a, assigs b WHERE a.assigsId = b.assigsId AND approval='승인' AND progress=1 AND a.prjno = #{prjno} GROUP BY b.memno) a, (SELECT b.memno, count(*) allwork FROM tasks a, assigs b WHERE a.assigsId = b.assigsId AND approval='승인' AND a.prjno = #{prjno} GROUP BY b.memno) b, membership c WHERE a.memno = b.memno AND b.memno = c.memno AND a.memno=c.memno
SELECT * FROM (select status, count(*) count from risk WHERE prjno = #{prjno} GROUP BY status) a ORDER BY DECODE(status,'진행중',1,'보류',2,'완료',3)
mapper.update: update uiformat set box1=#{box1}, box2=#{box2}, box3=#{box3}, box4=#{box4} where memno=#{memno}
